biblio_id.description: Internal identifier for the parent bibliographic record

hold_queue_length.description: number of holdings placed on title/item

holding_library_id.description: Library that is currently in possession item

home_library_id.description: Internal library id for the library the item belongs to

location.description: authorized value for the shelving location for this item

collection_code.description: Authorized value for the collection code associated with this item

collection_code_description.description: Collection ccode description as printed in the staff client
